title: perma banned after 1 game back lol
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
DeâdMâu5: top
In-Game
DeâdMâu5: omfg ok ill go on bot
DeâdMâu5: why are you flaming me over going to a lane i called?
DeâdMâu5: i am going bot 
Deâ5dMâu: no know what you take bot alone
DeâdMâu5: ill "chill out on top"
DeâdMâu5: no im "chilling on top"
DeâdMâu5: REPORT ME IM NOT GOING BOT I CALLED TOP THEY CAN FLAME ME ALL THEY WANT IM NOT GOING BOT IM NOT SUPPORT DAR CAN LEAVE
DeâdMâu5: OH ok yi i got you
DeâdMâu5: you that lvl of troll huh ?
DeâdMâu5: i got you man your a troll apparently
DeâdMâu5: lol your a troll
DeâdMâu5: your "report iralia for bla bla bla"
DeâdMâu5: you are the problem wit this game
DeâdMâu5: report yi for being toxic af
DeâdMâu5: and calling me the N word
DeâdMâu5: rofl dude
DeâdMâu5: yi started flaming me for going to a lane i called ???? lol
DeâdMâu5: omg he is still flaming me over top lane wtf
DeâdMâu5: ?
DeâdMâu5: hahah he sounds so nice in all chat
DeâdMâu5: why haha do people even flame other team mates for going to a lane they call lol ?
DeâdMâu5: oh god here comes the ego
DeâdMâu5: that is the riven top lane fed
DeâdMâu5: the lane you guys flamed me for going to
DeâdMâu5: the lane i called
DeâdMâu5: report yi plz
DeâdMâu5: look at yi
DeâdMâu5: and be mad at me
DeâdMâu5: i play yi you should be 20-30 kills up man
DeâdMâu5: besides that is not why i want to report you
DeâdMâu5: you started screaming to report me for going to a lane i called
DeâdMâu5: wow and now ahri in on it along with zyra
DeâdMâu5: talk trash all you want you know yi is trolling all of us dude
DeâdMâu5: im not new to this lol
Post-Game
DeâdMâu5: yi
DeâdMâu5: why play the game man ?
DeâdMâu5: see he gone
DeâdMâu5: already
DeâdMâu5: troll
DeâdMâu5: and you 2 fell for it
DeâdMâu5: and joind him trolling me
DeâdMâu5: good job
DeâdMâu5: dont fall for tat shit guys honestly
DeâdMâu5: he trolled all of you
DeâdMâu5: from the very start
DeâdMâu5: you guys didnt notice him sitting in jungle when they all pused up mid ?
DeâdMâu5: pushed *
DeâdMâu5: and ou flame me for not wanting to go bot hahah when i canend top ?
